channel.title: Certificates on Saitejas Mopuri
channel.description: Recent content in Certificates on Saitejas Mopuri

item.title: Cloud Practicioner
item.description: Digital badge What is this certification? The AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner examination is intended for individuals who have the knowledge and skills necessary to effectively demonstrate an overall understanding of the AWS Cloud, independent of specific technical roles addressed by other AWS Certifications Abilities Validated by the Certification Define what the AWS Cloud is and the basic global infrastructure Describe basic AWS Cloud architectural principles

item.title: Coursera Machine Learning
item.description: certificate What is this course? This course has provided me a broad introduction to machine learning datamining statistical pattern recognition. Topics include: (i) Supervised learning (parametric/non-parametric algorithms, support vector machines, kernels, neural networks). (ii) Unsupervised learning (clustering, dimensionality reduction, recommender systems, deep learning). (iii) Best practices in machine learning (bias/variance theory; innovation process in machine learning and AI).

item.title: Coursera Tensorflow in practice
item.description: certificate What is this course? In this hands-on, four-course Professional Certificate program, I have learned the necessary tools to build scalable AI-powered applications with TensorFlow TensorFlow is one of the most in-demand and popular open-source deep learning frameworks available today. The DeepLearning.AI TensorFlow Developer Professional Certificate program has taught me how to apply machine learning skills with TensorFlow so I can build and train powerful models

item.title: Machine Learning Boot Camp
item.description: What did I learn through this course? Programming with Python NumPy with Python Using pandas Data Frames to solve complex tasks Use pandas to handle Excel Files Web scraping with python Connect Python to SQL Use matplotlib and seaborn for data visualizations Use plotly for interactive visualizations Machine Learning with SciKit Learn, including: Linear Regression K Nearest Neighbors K Means Clustering Decision Trees Random Forests Natural Language Processing Neural Nets and Deep Learning Support Vector Machines
